page.title: 13Other Local Industries
page.content: The{King's Worthy Foundry,}although reduced in size over the years, still produces a large selection of fireside furniture. Other industries are smaller and include{Mitchell Marquees, who supply and erect marquees for weddings, fetes and garden parties; two{garages,}one selling only oil and petrol, while the other includes a very busy repair shop. {Watercress growing and chicken farming are also important local industries. These, together with{shops and public {houses,}provide local employment.
